amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 304 which caps the amount that may be awarded for punitive damages in Y2K litigation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 and printed in Part 2 of H. Rept. 106-134 to strike section 304 that caps the punitive damages awarded.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 124).
